q01.question: Which of the following statements regarding pipelines are true (select all that apply)?

responses.a: Pipelines are the ultimate manifestation of the Unix Philosophy.
responses.b: Pipelines work by sending the standard output and error of one process to the standard input of another process.
responses.c: Pipelines are an uncommon computational pattern only found on Unix systems.

q02.question: When using curl, we sometimes need to use the -L flag. Why is that?

responses.a: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to filter any URLs present in the requested resource.
responses.b: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to save the requested resource to the local file system.
responses.c: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to listen on a specific port for the requested resource.
responses.d: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to follow any HTTP redirects in the requested resource.

q03.question: When using grep or sed, we sometimes need to use the -E flag. Why is that?

responses.a: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns as shell globs.
responses.b: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns as literal strings rather than regular expressions.
responses.c: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns as extended regular expressions.
responses.d: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns in an case-insensitive manner.

q04.question:
Given the list of words located at /usr/share/dict/words on the student machines (or https://yld.me/raw/a9bD online), use filters and pipelines to perform the following tasks:

Note: For each of these, enter in the count not the pipeline.

  1. Count the number of words that end with the letters "est". ____

    abbest
abdest
ablest
abruptest
absolutest
...

  2. Ignoring case, count the number of words that start with the letter "j". ____

    ...
Jynginae
jyngine
Jynx
jynx
Jyoti

  3. Ignoring case, count the number of unique five-letter words that have at least three consecutive vowels (ie. a, e, i, o, u). ____

    ...
zoeae
zoeal
zoeas
zooid
zuian

  4. Ignoring case, count the number of unique six-letter words that contain the pattern "vowel-character-character-vowel", where "vowel" and "character" refer to the same character respectively. ____

    ...
yobbos
yvette
zaffar
zimmis
zinnia

  5. Count the number of words contain at least one digit, but doesn't start with a digit. ____

    A-1
A1
a1
A4
A5
...
